articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: PC Gaming Show 2023: When it starts and how to watch the livestream - Polygon
articles.description: PC Gamer’s annual PC Gaming Show streams live on Sunday, June 11, promising updates and news on more than 50 PC games, including Stormgate, Baldur’s Gate 3, and Frostpunk 2.
articles.content: PC Gamers annual games showcase promises to be a big one

articles.author: Jamie Klein
articles.title: Le Mans 24 Hours: Ferrari beats Toyota in race of attrition - Autosport
articles.description: Ferrari scored its first outright Le Mans 24 Hours victory in 58 years as Alessandro Pier Guidi, James Calado and Antonio Giovinazzi took top honours ahead of Toyota in the centenary edition of the race.
articles.content: On the Italian manufacturer's return to top-flight competition at the Circuit de la Sarthe with the new 499P Le Mans Hypercar, the #51 crew delivered Ferrari its first outright Le Mans win since Mast… [+8056 chars]

articles.title: Newly Discovered Dinosaur Iani May Have Been Species' “Last Gasp” in a Changing Planet - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The newly discovered dinosaur, Iani smithi, lived during the climatic upheavals of the mid-Cretaceous era and might be the last of its lineage, replaced by duckbill dinosaurs. This dinosaur, found in Utah, represents a critical transitional period in dinosaur…
articles.content:
ByNorth Carolina State UniversityJune 10, 2023
Artists reconstruction of Iani smithi. This recently discovered early ornithopod dinosaur may represent a species final stand during a period of global… [+6646 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Have Mapped the Ground Beneath Antarctica's Most Vulnerable Glacier for the First Time - SciTechDaily
articles.description: For the first time, a team including an expert from Swansea has charted the ground beneath Antarctica's most at-risk glacier, providing vital insights into its susceptibility to climate change. The team's study of the sub-glacial geology of West Antarctica's …
articles.content:
BySwansea UniversityJune 10, 2023
